messages.subject: Re: Anyone in the Seattle, Wa area
messages.msgSnippet: Hey, Kasey, We re in Issaquah! I m Robin, mum to dd Michelle (WOW, Wii, and Nintendo DS gamer, clay artist, horse lover, and always-enlightening 12-year-old
messages.messageBody:
Hey, Kasey,

We're in Issaquah! I'm Robin, mum to dd Michelle (WOW, Wii, and Nintendo DS gamer, clay
artist, horse lover, and always-enlightening 12-year-old <g>). We've been here for
almost 4 years, following a move from Vancouver, B.C.

I echo Kelly's suggestion of attending the Life is Good conference. We've been unschooling
for years, but there is nothing like a conference to make you feel like you've come "home."
I met some of my favorite people there last year; they've since become dear friends and
my best support.

E-mail me off-list, if you like.

Robin B.
